name: Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4信息泄露漏洞
product: ["Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2 <=1.19.5", "Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4 <=1.19.5"]
description: Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4都是美国Azure Access Technology公司的一种网络门禁控制器。Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4存在信息泄露漏洞，该漏洞是由于身份验证不正确造成的。攻击者可利用该漏洞获取服务器版本信息。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://azure-access.com/cve-2025-12477/
patch: Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4信息泄露漏洞的补丁
